Text: 911 was an outside job by al qaeda.

@theqool: Did you actually watch this before you commented?

This documentary isn't focussed on who did it, it simply explains what happened when the twin towers collapsed. If you have a mind of your own I dare you to watch this. Maybe you'll find out for yourself some conspiracy theories are more than just a theory. If not, you at least know what you're bashing.
